title: The Steps We Have to Take
albumCredits: All songs written and produced by Eric Bjella. Recorded at Eric Bjella's studio in Fort Collins, CO, Wise Acre Recording in Nashville, TN (drums), Maxwell Trettor's studio in Fort Collins, CO (drums), Little House of Sound in Fort Collins, CO (bass). Mixed by Eric Smith at Little House of Sound. Mastered by Alan Douches at West West Side Music. Artwork by Eric Bjella. Cover photo taken at the top of Severance Mountain overlooking Schroon lake in upstate New York on 7/1/2023 when winds blew in heavy canadian wildfire smoke. © & ℗ 2026 Good Carver, all rights reserved.
